thread.title: James
thread.title_full: Taxes for Expats reviewed by James

author: James
title: James
text: I had intended to go with the old default US tax-prep service. That Block one. But their estimated cost for my not-very complicated return (I had done my own tax returns for more than fifty years!) seemed outrageous. So I searched for an alternative and found it in Taxes for Expats. Before engaging with TFX, I checked it out here at TrustPilot. Its ratings are impressive . . . and, I can now report, well-deserved. And the cost at TFX was one-third of what Block had asked for.
